content.value:
“I’m having a bad menstrual cycle so I decided not to work yesterday.“ I just Slacked that to a male client. TMI?  Meh. This is my truth on the only non-invasive long-term plan to not get pregnant, my IUD. 

A rage-filled thread about periods & contraception coming soon...
